entity.species.wraptor.description: A large, neutral avian found in warped forests, these creatures with the right care, can prove to be a reliable source of feathers. Be careful to though not shed them completely!
entity.species.birt.description: A not-quite bird that flock in birch forests, and are able to communicate with each other over long distances using a long antenna on the top of their heads.
entity.species.roombug.description: A large, lazy arthropod that can easily carry other mobs on top of them, tameable with honey.
entity.species.limpet.description: A shy mollusk whose shells can occasionally have minerals on them that can be extracted, but not before chasing the limpet down.
entity.species.deepfish.description: An enigmatic fish found underground, making musical 'hums' in order to communicate.
entity.species.cruncher.description: A huge and hungry beast that seems keen on eating you before you can feed it! Once friendly, can be given mob drops to spit out a large amount in a pellet once a day.
entity.species.goober.description: A giant, sleepy jurassic beast that can't seem to nap due to its snot. Use a brush on them to help them sneeze.
entity.species.springling.description: A long, lanky fellow that's neck can extend or retract its neck, which is tameable with saplings.
entity.species.treeper.description: A shy, peaceful tree that only removes its roots at night to wander. Use a flint and steel to freeze it, or water bucket to let it move again. Or an axe for a new sapling friend.
entity.species.trooper.description: A little creeper minion that will guard you the best way creepers know how, of course without damaging the grass. Tameable with bone meal, and can be lit with a flint and steel.
entity.species.mammutilation.description: A mammoth summoned by specific block orientation which spits red ichor you can bottle.
lore.species.wraptor_egg: This is quite a tough egg! Give the avian a little help hatching with an anvil.
lore.species.cracked_wraptor_egg: You monster! Tasty yolk that empowers you to suddenly fight wither skeletons.
lore.species.birt_egg: Birt eggs are extremely tough and can concuss mobs or players if thrown at them. Can also create a disc with enough disc shards.
lore.species.deepfish_bucket: Just a cute puffy song-fish, won't despawn when placed.
lore.species.cruncher_egg: When you hear the music, the beast has hatched. Instead of running from, run towards it and tame it for a pleasant surprise!
lore.species.cruncher_pellet: It's like a present, only if presents were wrapped in saliva. Its contents are the mob drop you gave the cruncher, but more.
lore.species.petrified_egg.description: This egg seems too cold to hatch a goober, try placing it over a campfire or magma block.
lore.species.springling_egg: You found me! Let this egg hatch for a helpful friend in building.
lore.species.ancient_pinecone: Pinecones are just like little babies of trees, I wonder if this one could grow a baby too. When planted these saplings grow troopers.
lore.species.music_disc_dial: A music disc that can be created through eight disc shards and a birt egg, and can be played in a jukebox.
lore.species.music_disc_lapidarian: A special music disc found buried in red suspicious sand, can be played in a jukebox.
lore.species.ichor_bottle: It kind of smells, but the shine makes it seem like it has purpose. Try to combine it with an egg and phantom membrane.
lore.species.youth_potion: Reverts any living mob with a baby variant back to one. If you find that kind of stuff cute.
lore.species.alphacene_grass_block: A beautiful block created by gooper snot.
lore.species.alphacene_moss_block: A beautiful block created by gooper snot. Unlike other moss, cannot use bone meal on it to grow.
lore.species.alphacene_moss_carpet: A beautiful block created by gooper snot, but carpet! Crafted by two alphacene moss blocks.
lore.species.alphacene_mushroom_block: A yellow mushroom block with a light colored circle pattern. Grown from alphacene mushrooms.
lore.species.alphacene_mushroom_growth: A yellow mushroom's hanging growth. Can be placed on any ceiling and float.
lore.species.alphacene_mushroom: A yellow mushroom with a spiraling staircase design. Can be grown anywhere, regardless of light level.
lore.species.alphacene_grass: A grass, which seems to curl on itself in spirals. Bone meal can be used on it to increase its height to tall.
lore.species.alphacene_tall_grass: A grass, which seems to curl on itself in spirals, but taller. Grown from the alphacene grass and moss block.
lore.species.frozen_meat: Kept perfectly frozen beneath the Frozen Ocean, these are remnants of old gigantic creatures. I wonder if we can revive it.
lore.species.frozen_hair: Kept perfectly frozen beneath the Frozen Ocean, these are remnants of old gigantic creatures. I wonder if we can revive it.
lore.species.bone_bark: Fossils of gigantic, ancient creatures in badlands ecavation sites.
lore.species.bone_vertebra: Fossils of gigantic, ancient creatures in badlands ecavation sites.
lore.species.bone_spike: Fossils of gigantic, ancient creatures in badlands ecavation sites.
lore.species.chandelier: A spooky hanging light block that will emit a downwards facing spectral glow when placed.
lore.species.speclight: A ghastly light block that will emit a spectral glow when powered by redstone.
lore.species.hopelight: a creepy light block will emit a upwards facing spectral glow when place.
lore.species.birt_dwelling: The nest block of the strange bird like Birts, can be right clicked periodically for Birt Eggs.
lore.species.deflector_dummy: A hittable block that made of a quake core, when hit it will absorb and immediately reflect the damage dealt to it and when powered with redstone it will store that damage and release it all at once when unpowered.
lore.species.cranktrap: A trap block that will damage and immobilize anything caught in it when powered by redstone.
lore.species.kinetic_core: The core of a Quake. Can be crafted into a shield or deflector dummy
lore.species.werefang: The sharp teeth of a Bewereager.
lore.species.wicked_swapper: Will swap places with whatever mob it is thrown at.
lore.species.wicked_wax: The ever burning wax of a Wicked. Can be crafted into multiple mischevious items, or a bunch of torches.
lore.species.coil: The long and durable coiled tongue of a Leaf or Cliff Hanger can be placed onto fences to make a zipline that can be ridden with a Harpoon.
lore.species.harpoon: A useful tool made of Iron and Coils, can be thrown upwards to latch onto ceiling blocks and swing around.
